trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class representing a comparison that can be used to constrain an <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref> 를 제한 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 비교를 나타내는 기본 클래스는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] TrackingCondition is the abstract base class from which <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> is derived.

TrackingCondition is evaluated by comparing the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: TrackingCondition 비교 하 여 계산 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A>을 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A> 적용 하 여</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> 의 값

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 구현 된 경우의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the name of the member whose value will be compared.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 해당 값을 비교할 멤버의 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of Member will be compared to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 멤버의 값과 비교 됩니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A> 적용 하 여</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to be compared.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the operator to use in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 하는 경우 비교에 사용할 연산자를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 비교할 값을 설정 하거나 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Value will be compared to the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> by applying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A> 적용 하 여</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> 의 값에 값을 비교할
